channel.title: Mac OS - Image Rebuild :: The Light Church
channel.description: Hardware Device……..: Mac Mini (Late 2012) Processor..: 2.5Ghz Duel-Core Intel Memory…..: 8GB 1600mhz DDR3 (4GB x2) Graphics…: Intel HD Graphics 4000 (512mb) Local Disk.: Corsair Force GT 120GB SSD Quick Links MacOS Download (Help Page) OpenCORE OS Installer OenCORE LegacyOS Patcher OpenCORE Legacy Troubleshooting MountEFI Partition Operating System Rebuild Notes Download the latest OpenCore Legacy Patcher from GitHib Link Here. NOTE Once the zip has downloaded, it will auto extract the app
